## detectTheme() function

Detect the terminal's color palette and create a theme.

Detection strategy: 1. Check for VS Code family config (fast, \~5ms) 2. Fall back to OSC probing (\~1-100ms depending on terminal) 3. Fall back to T1 baseline if all else fails

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function detectTheme(options?: ThemeOptions): Promise<Theme>;
```
